data.text:
@IanJLibertarian @bbcquestiontime @globalhlthtwit It's not inconceivable. It actually happened last year. ITU capacity more than doubled in places. Some trusts were running out of oxygen. 
Covid ITU patients, even if they survive to discharge, incur longer admissions than a 'normal' pneumonia would, plus more aftercare.
